name: Interstellar Janitor
description:
"You're a cleaning inspector tasked with "cleaning" out a spaceship in order to return it to it's former glory, but your not just "cleaning" any ordinary dirt..."

Interstellar Janitor is a mystery strategy game, where you're tasked with "Cleaning" out suspicious props and furniture all over the spaceship. Players need to check any suspicious entity's all around the map in order to make the spaceship habitable once more....

Don't forget !! You have a limited time to "Clean" the spaceship, so choose wisely.....

HOW TO PLAY

The main objective of this game is to find all the ALIENS that is mimicking other objects in the Spaceship. You can press "Z" on an object that you feel is out of place and destroy it, you only have a limited amount of time to find all the ALIENS in the Spaceship.

We have a total of 4 Endings in our game, so good luck and hope you have a safe "Cleaning" experience :))

ActionsControlsMovementArrow KeysInteractZ IconInfoShows how many mistakes allowed in a given levelShows how many ALIENS are left on the Spaceship RoleNameGame Programmer & Game DesignerDerian ArdenichsonGame DesignerArkannabil Pratama2D Artist & Sound EngineerLauretta Gail Rosalind Wijaya2D ArtistFerrySound EngineerSebastian Putra Cahyadi
